subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Veteran pitcher John Smoltz is expected to sign a one-year deal for $5.5 million with the Boston Red Sox, who have also signed outfielder Rocco Baldelli.
snippet: Veteran pitcher John Smoltz is expected to sign a one-year deal for $5.5 million with the Boston Red Sox, who have also signed outfielder Rocco Baldelli.
